title: Resurrection of Mac OS 9
description:
This is a SheepShaver-compatible set of hard drive images with Mac OS 9.0.4, plus hundreds of classic games and almost 400 applications! Files included:
	6.9GB Mac OS 9.0.4 and applications
	7.8GB Games
	  2GB Bonus material: wallpapers, system sounds, icon collections, etc.
	2.5GB Mac OS 9.0.4 clean install
	Software list
	Screenshots
	SheepShaver (an old version) preconfigured for Mac and Windows

The login password is "password".

I didn't create these disk images, originally called Ã¢â‚¬Å“Resurrection of Mac OS 9 (SheepShaver for PCs and Intel Macs)Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½. Hopefully, hosting them here will keep them available going forward.

Have fun with this great classic software collection!
